name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I am proficient in **Git**, **Java**, **Python**, **Linux**, and **Docker**, making me adept in agile development practices using tools like **Jira** and **Confluence**. I possess solid knowledge of **C** and **C++**, ensuring versatile programming capabilities. I specialize in building high-performance, scalable applications, with a strong focus on infrastructure as code principles. My background in full-stack development is complemented by my extensive experience with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Flutter**. I have successfully delivered enterprise-grade platforms in healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My hands-on cloud expertise spans **Azure** and **AWS**, and I have integrated AI/ML capabilities into my projects for predictive analytics and data processing. Additionally, my experience with microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation ensures secure applications that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
